page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
We have a lot of entertainment in our village:_
{YOUTH CLUB:}There is a senior and a junior youth club. { BADMINTON:} Mrs. Hockin runs the badminton, for the juniors and the seniors. {BINGO:}The bingo is once a month. Mrs.Dunn is the number caller. {W.I.:}We have a womens institute in the hall, there are some men that help organise. { DISCO:}We have discos nearly every Saturday night. { DANCES:}We have a dance after the open evenings. They are mostly by The Versatiles. {SKITTLES:}We have a skittle team. They have their own alley near the church.
